results.name: a(n) = Fibonacci(6n+5).
link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..750
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (18,-1).
Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
formula: a(n) = 5*S(n, 18) - S(n-1, 18), n >= 0, with the Chebyshev S-polynomials S(n-1, 18) = A049660(n). (See the g.f.) - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jul 10 2018
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 28 2007
